### Which party's contact information do you want to change?
 This includes any other attendees linked to the party, such as:
* litigation friends
* experts
* witnesses

 ### Which details do you want to update?

Individuals attending for the legal representatives

Please add or update the contact details of any individual who may attend a hearing on behalf of the claimant's legal representative.

Individuals attending for the legal representatives

Please add or update the contact details of any individual who may attend a hearing on behalf of the defendant's legal representative.

Individuals attending for the organisation

Please add or update the contact details of any individual who may attend a hearing on behalf of the claimant organisation.

Individuals attending for the organisation

Please add or update the contact details of any individual who may attend a hearing on behalf of the defendant organisation.
